title: Install PriceMon
subtitle: Install PriceMon on your device for a faster, native app experience. Access it anytime from your home screen!

alreadyInstalled.title: App Already Installed!
alreadyInstalled.description: PriceMon is installed on your device. You're already enjoying the full app experience!

readyToInstall.title: Ready to Install!
readyToInstall.description: Your browser supports one-click installation. Click below to add PriceMon to your home screen.

performance.title: Faster Performance
performance.description: Optimized app experience with instant loading

fullscreen.title: Full Screen Mode
fullscreen.description: No browser UI - more space for scanning

homeScreen.title: Home Screen Access
homeScreen.description: Launch directly like a native app

privacy.title: Better Privacy
privacy.description: Isolated from browser history and cookies

step1.title: Tap the Share button
step1.description: Look for the icon at the bottom of Safari

step2.title: Select "Add to Home Screen"
step2.description: Scroll down and tap the option with a + icon

step3.title: Confirm and Install
step3.description: The app name will be "PriceMon" - tap "Add" to finish

step4.title: Done! Find the app on your home screen
step4.description: PriceMon will now open full-screen like a native app

step1.title: Look for the install banner
step1.description: Chrome will show an "Install PriceMon" banner at the bottom of the screen

step2.title: Tap "Install"
step2.description: Or tap the menu (⋮) → "Add to Home screen" / "Install app"

step3.title: Done! Open from your app drawer
step3.description: PriceMon appears alongside your other apps

step1.title: Tap the menu button (⋮)
step1.description: Located in the top right corner of Firefox

step2.title: Select "Install"
step2.description: Look for the "Install" or "Add to Home screen" option with a phone icon

step3.title: Confirm installation
step3.description: Firefox will add PriceMon to your home screen

step1.title: Look for the install icon
step1.description: A icon will appear in the address bar

step3.title: Launch as desktop app
step3.description: PriceMon opens in its own window, separate from your browser

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: If you don't see the install option, try:
help.tip3: Making sure you're using a supported browser (Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge)
help.tip4: Checking that you're on HTTPS (secure connection)
